content:
Hello folks! I have been learning rust for awhile and the experience was pretty good(wasn't easy though :sweat_smile: ). Is there specific stream for beginner level questions, or the #general stream is fine for just asking questions of anything rusty?

And is there anyway to hide the userlist UI? Didn't find any config option that does this :sweat_smile:

I don't think you can hide the user list (#zulip might be a better place to ask). #general is fine for questions, but Zulip is mostly oriented towards compiler/tools developers, while the Discord server is for general users. Those questions aren't shunned here, but you might get faster/more/better answers on Discord.
Link for the community Discord, in case you don't have it: https://discord.gg/aVESxV8
